member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Client.CommonControls.Logic.TCommonScreensForwarding
member.summary: Allows calls to Screens that are defined in various Assemblies from within various Assemblies. This resolves the problem of circular references between Assemblies that would come up with conventional calls to Screens.

member.name: P:Ict.Petra.Client.CommonControls.Logic.TCommonScreensForwarding.OpenPartnerFindScreen
member.summary: This property is used to provide a function which opens a modal Partner Find screen.
member.description: The Delegate is set up at the start of the application.

member.name: P:Ict.Petra.Client.CommonControls.Logic.TCommonScreensForwarding.OpenConferenceFindScreen
member.summary: This property is used to provide a function which opens the conference find screen.
member.description: The Delegate is set up at the start of the application.

member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Client.CommonControls.Logic.TDelegateOpenPartnerFindScreen
member.summary: Delegate for a call to open a Modal Partner Find screen

member.name: T:Ict.Petra.Client.CommonControls.Logic.TDelegateOpenConferenceFindScreen
member.summary: Delegate for a call to open a Modal Partner Find screen
